title: hg change loses commit message on network error
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. export http_proxy=http://bogusbogusbogus
2. hg change
3. write long commit message
4. save
5. codereview.py explodes, losing your commit message

What is the expected output?

save that tmp file somewhere.

I just lost a long commit message, and Robert did yesterday too.
